characters: Driver of a white sedan, motorcyclist, pedestrians
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a rural road. Ahead, a white sedan is moving slowly. A motorcyclist and several pedestrians are visible on the right side of the road. The motorcyclist is approaching the self-driving vehicles path, and pedestrians are crossing the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while following the white sedan ahead. The vehicle is preparing to decelerate due to the motorcyclist and pedestrians crossing the road.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving slowly. 2) Right: A motorcyclist, approximately 5 meters away, approaching the vehicles path. 3) Right: Several pedestrians, approximately 5 meters away, crossing the road.
